database.name: VIEW ESCM_ANNOUCEMENTS_V
database.view: SELECT get_uuid() AS escm_annoucements_v_id, escm_annoucements.ad_client_id, escm_annoucements.ad_org_id, escm_annoucements.isactive, escm_annoucements.created, escm_annoucements.createdby, escm_annoucements.updated, escm_annoucements.updatedby, escm_annoucements.line, escm_annoucements.annoucedate, escm_annoucements.escm_annoucements_id, escm_annousummarybid.escm_bidmgmt_id, escm_annousummarymedia.medianame, escm_annousummarymedia.mediatype, escm_annoucements.anndatefrom, escm_annoucements.anndateto, escm_annousummarymedia.annlang, escm_annousummarymedia.annplace, escm_annousummarymedia.editionno, escm_annousummarymedia.editiondate, escm_annoucements.contactperson, escm_annoucements.coordinatorname, escm_annoucements.frequency, escm_annoucements.space, escm_annousummarymedia.printedon, escm_annoucements.notes, escm_annoucements.annoucement_no, row_number() OVER (PARTITION BY escm_annousummarybid.escm_bidmgmt_id) * 10 AS rownum, escm_annousummarymedia.onlinemedia, escm_annousummarymedia.mediacode FROM escm_annoucements JOIN escm_annousummarybid ON escm_annoucements.escm_annoucements_id = escm_annousummarybid.escm_annoucements_id JOIN escm_annousummarymedia ON escm_annoucements.escm_annoucements_id = escm_annousummarymedia.escm_annoucements_id ORDER BY escm_annousummarybid.created
